name: Don't hit it!
description: Don't hit it. Double press the spacebar to start the game. Blocks will be flying from the top and from the left side of the screen. Control the middle block by avoiding those blocks. Avoid them until you reach 100 point! After 50 points, you will also have a black glowing ball which you can go and touch to gain points. Good luck and DON'T HIT IT!
